question: Write a letter to the person in charge of the seminar and ask for detailed information regarding the dates, program, accommodation and cost.
text: I am writing this letter in regards to SAP Global conference which will be conducted in June at London, UK.

I am currently heading SAP Implementation for Vodafone Group of Companies. To understand various aspects of Modern technology and new integrations within SAP Tool, I along with my in-house team would be obliged to participate in this big technology transforming event.

In order to plan my journey in advance and make necessary arrangements, I would like to understand some details about the program like the start and end dates of the program, the length of the program each day, and Accommodation details like type of accommodation and cost involved if any. The overall expense of the seminar. I would also like to understand in detail what important points the seminar might cover each day. It would be great if we can get a schedule in advance.
Please respond at your earliest convenience. I am looking forward to hearing from you !
